column4: can cookies cause my Ubuntu any troubles?  Are they a security risk to my PC?
not nearly as many as there would be in Windows, plus, you can always clear them
but I cannot clear them all, because some cookies I need to auto login in to some websites.  Is there a cookie cleaner for Ubuntu Firefox that allows me to tell it not to clear some cookies?
perhaps.......take a look around Synaptic, see what you can find
